parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The streaming domain and ingest domain. The value of this parameter is used as a filter condition for a fuzzy match. If you do not set this parameter, all domain names for CDN within your Alibaba Cloud account are queried.

parameters.name: DomainSearchType
parameters.description:
The search method. Valid values:

*   **fuzzy_match**: fuzzy match. This is the default value.
*   **pre_match**: prefix match.
*   **suf_match**: suffix match.
*   **full_match**: exact match.

parameters.name: DomainStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the domain names. Valid values:

*   **online**: enabled domain names.
*   **offline**: disabled domain names.
*   **configuring**: domain names that are being configured.

parameters.name: LiveDomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name. Valid values:

*   **liveVideo**: streaming domain
*   **liveEdge**: edge ingest domain

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Valid values: **1 to 100000**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**. Maximum value: **50**.

parameters.name: RegionName
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the streaming domains reside.
